name: Color Me Hapy
description:
This is a platformer that’s takes you on a journey through the colourful world of a child's watercolour paintings.

 

This game was made during the 2018 Castle game jame in Örebro.

The game has a controller mapping feature that can be reached from the start menu. Out of the box will the game work with ps4 controller and other controller should work after they has been configured.

Tips:

You can “climb” stuff by repeatedly jump in front of them.  
Happy sun in the speak bubbles means that whoever is speaking is happy and you need everybody in the level to be happy to progress.
